english.segment1: I realize I missed a day. But I'm too wrecked to care anyway. I look around and see this face. What the hell have I lost my taste
english.segment2: Don't want to find out. Just want to cut out
english.segment3: My head explodes, my ears ring. I can't remember just where I've been. The last thing that I recall. I got lost in a deep black hole
english.segment4: Don't want to find out. Just want to cut out
english.segment5: Blackout. I really had a Blackout
english.segment6: I grab my things and make a run. On my way out, another one. Would like to know before I stop. Did I make it or did I flop
english.segment7: Don't want to find out. Just want to get out
english.segment8: Blackout. I really had a Blackout
english.segment9: Don't want to find out. Just want to get out
english.segment10: Blackout. I really had a Blackout
